title: AR/VR Wearable-Based Mixed Reality English Immersion Learning Course

context.prior_knowledge: High school-level English communication skills, basic proficiency in digital device utilization
context.additional_context: Learners access AR/VR wearable devices via personal devices (BYOD), enhancing English communication skills in virtual environments reflecting real-life contexts

learning_goals: In AR/VR environments, learners complete at least six out of eight conversation checklist items across five real-life scenarios (hotel check-in, restaurant ordering, shopping refunds, etc.), and conduct three-minute-or-longer dialogues using ten or more advanced vocabulary terms
Achieving over 80% learning immersion by applying ARCS model-based motivational elements (attention, relevance, confidence, satisfaction) in mixed reality learning environments
Improving English communication accuracy reflecting cultural contexts by 75% through VR-based role-playing
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
